FieldSet.description:
Any fields here will only show up if "Use Bill-to as Admin" is unchecked. 2-Columns.
Note the following is in Apex Code: * The Admin First/Last Name, Phone, Email, Address 1, City, State, Postal Code, and Country fields are cleared if "Use Bill-to as Admin" is checked * The same information (except First/Last Name, Phone, and Email) is also used during a validation procedure
FieldSet.label: Section 1: Portal Admin/Cloud Control/Agenday Admin Client (admin)
